Package swinglib

package swinglib
  • Class
    Description
    AbstractScreen
    Reusable utility class for swing Screen classes that extend JPanel and are for UIs.
    AbstractScreen.Bounds
    Bounds of a component on the screen.
    Audio
    A class to play audio clips.
    Example
    Simple example program demonstrating swinglib's capabilities
    Fonts
    Class with default fonts to use.
    LabeledComponent<C extends Component>
    Class that wraps a component and adds a label to it
    Log
    Google-style logger to make debugging easier
    Log.Severity
    Severity levels for logging, used to filter out lower-level messages once they are no longer needed
    Pair<F,S>
    Class to hold two objects
    Rand
    Class that creates random integers
    Stringer
    Class that implements a toString method for objects automatically.
    Triplet<F,S,T>
    Class to hold three objects
    Util
    Class with various utility functions
